Interface ConsumerBuilder.StreamFilterOptions

All Superinterfaces:
ConsumerBuilder.FilterOptions<ConsumerBuilder.StreamFilterOptions>
Enclosing interface:
ConsumerBuilder
public static interface ConsumerBuilder.StreamFilterOptions extends ConsumerBuilder.FilterOptions<ConsumerBuilder.StreamFilterOptions>
Filter options for support of AMQP filter expressions.

Specialized ConsumerBuilder.FilterOptions in the context of the configuration of a stream consumer.
